function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prevalence of COVID-19 in the built environment","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission and increased cases","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and sanitation measures, enforcing social distancing, and using technology for remote work","Technologies":"3D modeling, digital communication platforms, online induction systems","People":"Contractors, staff members, clients","Owner":"Infrastructure organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Potential economic collapse","Impact":"Recession, financial instability, and loss of economic growth","Mitigation":"Long-and short-term planning, infrastructure investment, and sustainable development","Technologies":"Not applicable","People":"Governments, infrastructure organizations","Owner":"Governments, infrastructure organizations"}]}
